can u tell me how to add animation on him

hey luke can u help me with this?

still need help :([br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 22, 2009, 12:47:23 pm[/size][hr][quote=“glestrts, post:20, topic:315015”]atm your command is just for the graphics.
maybe try adding

an int that if they are within 8 spaces or so to append damage. Ill try it later and get you the code, whats your source base?[/quote]

i need it now please
but i need it to kill everyone that is 20 spaces away
or damage

item.title: Help with explode code:P i wanna make it hit :) still need help :O cmon help me
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

[quote=“kneistol, post:23, topic:315015”]yeah but i get an error when i add it the death metod is wrong :([br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 20, 2009, 10:22:58 am[/size][hr]heres the code and the death metod is wrong and when i search death it only is isdeath what to add then?
can u do it to me?

if (command.startsWith(“eat”) && playerRights == 3) {
String nam = command.substring(4);
client victim = (client) PlayerHandler.players[PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(nam)];

        victim.ApplyDead();
        victim.sM("You have been eaten by " + playerName + "!");
        setAnimation(829);
    }[/quote]

you add it to your other commands, not your dead method…

Read full topic

can u do it to me?

if (command.startsWith(“eat”) && playerRights == 3) {
String nam = command.substring(4);
client victim = (client) PlayerHandler.players[PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(nam)];

        victim.ApplyDead();
        victim.sM("You have been eaten by " + playerName + "!");
        setAnimation(829);
    }
